content: promised myself i wouldn't touch this meme format again but this one really needed fixing

photo.alt:
Anakin and Padme meme. Anakin says:
"You need to know an assortment of technical tricks from memory without Google"
Padme replies:
"But you‚Äôll pay me the value of my labor, right?"
Anakin looks at her doubtfully. Padme continues,
"You‚Äôre not just pointlessly gatekeeping the interview process to reclaim some sense of power in a system that ultimately leaves us all powerless, fighting each other for dignity and scraps while the bosses get rich off our labor right?"

The tweet I'm quote-tweeting is a similar format, but making fun of front-end developers who don't know how to add event listeners in JS off by heart during an interview.
a meme with a guy that says ‚Äúi know angular, react, svelte and vue‚Äù and a woman asks ‚Äúbut you know how to add an event listener in javascript right?‚Äù ... awkward silence
